note:
I'm Borealis, AKA the LiteralGrill, and welcome to my home on the Fediverse. My ass is hot and my takes are even hotter, so be prepared!

I'm 31 year-old award-winning author and poet that currently is focused on writing essays about anime and manga these days. I also watched Groundhog Day once a day, every day, to celebrate the movie's 30th anniversary.

While I often support the use of content warnings, I will not use them surrounding topics on the life I'm living as a trans and disabled person. See my pinned intro post for details.

With this in mind, you'll like following my page if you care about:

- Disability Justice (I'm Autistic, have ADHD, and am a wheelchair-using amputee.)
- Old weird video games, media formats, and odd technology
- Anime, manga, and analyzing both
- Are radically leftist in general
- Understand that COVID is not over
- Think puns are the height of humor

Sizzle sizzle baby~ ðŸ”¥ðŸ”¥ðŸ”¥
